title: Circle App
description: A social media application built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for creating and sharing content within a vibrant community.

title: My Store
description: An e-commerce platform featuring a mobile-first design and integrated with WhatsApp bot automation for seamless customer communication.

title: Instacard
description: A digital business card and link-in-bio application, similar to Linktree, for consolidating your online presence.

title: Todo
description: A Trello-like project management tool to organize tasks, track progress, and collaborate with teams in a visual workflow.
